title: Tatertot Casserole
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cook and stir ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat until no longer pink and completely browned; season with salt and black pepper.
Stir cream of mushroom soup into the cooked ground beef; pour the mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Layer tater tots evenly over the ground beef mixture; top with Cheddar cheese.
Bake until tater tots are golden brown and hot, 30 to 45 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
